version_description: Gameplay optimization
- Gameplay optimization
Spooky Halloween theme!

NEW FEATURE
Daily Catch
- A new Catch every day (the more days, the better)!

- Visual improvements
- Bug fixes

It's Christmas time again and...winter is coming!
- Advent Calendar added (open a free Present every day!)
- New crew-member "Holly" added
- New items and fishes added
- Items can now be upgraded further!

- Aaaand some bug fixes :)

Happy fishing and Merry Christmas! ^_^

(Sorry for the delay of the Christmas update, we encountered some hiccups)

It's Christmas time again and... winter is coming!
- Advent Calendar added (open a free Present every day!)
- New crew-member "Holly" added
- New items and fishes added
- Items can now be upgraded further!
- Some ad issues fixed
- Aaaand some other bug fixes :)

Happy fishing and Merry Christmas! ^_^


(It should have been available from December 1st but we had some hiccups, sorry!)

v1.2.4:
- Bug fixes
- Ad fixes

Hope you all had a great Christmas!

NEW CONTENT UPDATE
- New Deep Water Levels added!
- New Boats added!
- New "Goals" added!

v1.5.7
* Sound effects added
* Bug fixes :)

v1.5.5 - Shark Season has arrived!
- (NEW) Event starting July 26th!
* Catch the monster shark, Sharlene. She retains damage taken and will take many encounters to catch!
* Use Shark Bait to lure her and other Sharks!
* K. Nash joins the fight against the Sharks (he lost his arm to one of them)!
* The 'Sharpoon' will definately help you on the quest to catch them all!
- Bug fixes
- Stay tuned for more! :)

- Bug fixes
- Haptics support (for newer devices)

- Bug & ad fixes
- Shoal combo-multiplier added
- Added chance for giant version of fish to spawn

- Hidden feature added (revealed soon)
- Preparations for easter

Sorry for the delays, more content coming, stay tuned!

v1.4.1 - Easter Update
- Easter is almost here! A new Egg is hidden each day, make sure to find them all!
- 2 new crews added
- 2 new items added
- 2 new fishes added
- 1 new level added
- New quests added
- Bug fixes

v1.4.4- Spring Update (part 1)
- New "flow" when collecting 'Fishing Experience'
- Perk-system now enabled for all (+ some new visual changes to it)
- Bug fixes

- Stay tuned...something to do with fire is coming!

v1.4.6 - Spring Update (part 2)
- (NEW) Event starting June 28th!
* Complete new types Challenges!
* Collect Fireworks to catch new kinds of fish!
* Liberta & Joe joins the pool of Crews!
* The 'Boom Box' is a must if you want Fireworks when the event ends!
- Bug fixes

- Stay tuned!

v1.4.9
- Fix freeze issues
- Fix some more event bugs

Face your fishy fears with the limited time Halloween Event!

•Upgrade your spooky Buoy to catch undead sea creatures!
•Use Pumpkin Bait to lure Skeleton Fish and get the chance to spot the dreaded Hydrus!
•Equip the new Skull to increase your damage!
•Immediately max out your Buoy with the Legendary Blueprint!
+Bug Fixes

- Thanksgiving is here with its mighty feast!
- Bug fixes.

- Advent Calendar is here to greet us every day in the month of December!
- Thanksgiving event bug fixes.

- Enhanced Advent Calendar Event flow!
- Black Friday Sale fix!
- Bug fixes.
Ho ho ho, Merry Christmas to All! Our favorite event of the year is here!
- Celebrate New Year as we have the best surprise!
